alert.note: Alert for Coffee (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Coffee County through 400 PM CDT... At 330 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of New Brockton, or 10 miles northeast of Elba, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elba, Enterprise, Fort Rucker, New Brockton, Java, Chestnut Grove, Richburg, Mixons Crossroads, Victoria, Frisco, Eanon, Lowry Mill, Camp Humming Hills, Clintonville, Wise Mill, Shell Army Field, Roeton, Tabernacle, Camp Alaflo Bsa and Clowers Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
